      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable(Project project,
                           Editor editor,
                           PsiFile file)
        Description copied from interface: IntentionAction
        Checks whether this intention is available at a caret offset in the file. If this method returns true, a light bulb for this intention is shown.
        Parameters:
        project - the project in which the availability is checked.
        editor - the editor in which the intention will be invoked.
        file - the file open in the editor.
        Returns:
        true if the intention is available, false otherwise.

      • startInWriteAction

        public boolean startInWriteAction()
        Description copied from interface: IntentionAction
        Indicate whether this action should be invoked inside write action. Should return false if, e.g., a modal dialog is shown inside the action. If false is returned the action itself is responsible for starting write action when needed, by calling Application.runWriteAction(Runnable).
        Specified by:
        startInWriteAction in interface IntentionAction
        Specified by:
        startInWriteAction in interface WriteActionAware
        Overrides:
        startInWriteAction in class BaseIntentionAction
        Returns:
        true if the intention requires a write action, false otherwise.
